column4: hi - i have a huge problem with ubuntu. it froze and upon restart it threw out "Error 16: inconsistent filesystem". None o fthe kernels, or recovery modes work. I know a solution would be to run fsck but I cant even load from a liveCD
why can you not boot from a liveCD ?
I have no idea. it loads for a while and then just gives me a blinking cursor
then it is most likely a hardware issue, since the liveCD does not touch your hard drive installation
